title: Deployment
description: Deployments push changes to a runtime Evironment.

id.description: The unique ID of this Deployment.

self.description: The canonical URI for this record.

environment.description: The `self` URI of the related Environment, or a nested Environment record, if it exists.

originalEnvironment.description: The `self` URI of the related staging Environment if promoting to production, or a nested Environment record, if it exists.

commitOid.description: The oid of the Commit this Deployment ran on, if present.

branch.description: The name of the branch this Deployment is associated with, if present.

creator.description: The `self` URI of the Actor who created the Deployment, or a nested Actor record.

htmlUrl.description: The URL to view this Deployment.

statusUrl.description: The URL to view the status of this Deployment.

createdAt.description: The time this Deployment was created.
